description: Furuno Radar Module for TZ Pro with hopes to contract around mentioned Date.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Project Title:** Radar Module for TZ Pro

**Requisition Number:** PW-__QF-120-29294
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Request for Proposal (RFP) Number:** F5233-240001/A

**Publication Date:** March 5, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** August 28, 2024, at 2:00 PM

**Project Description:**

The Public Works and Government Services Canada is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the provision of a Furuno Radar Module for TZ Pro. This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is an open call to all interested suppliers.

**Key Requirements:**

* Delivery of a Furuno Radar Module for TZ Pro
* Compliance with CFTA
* Lowest/Lower bid procurement strategy

**Contracting Entity:**

* Public Works and Government Services Canada, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

**End User:**

* Fisheries and Oceans Canada

**Point of Contact:**

* Charlene Johnston
* Phone: (873) 469-3859
* Email: [charlene.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:charlene.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Documents:**

The tender package, including amendments 1 to 4, is available on the Canadabuy proceeded to Canada website.

**Important Information:**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Supplies must meet the requirements specified in the bid documents.

#### Latest Updates

The evaluation documents, bid evaluation report, and procurement notice are available on the Canadabuys Canada website.

#### Frequently Asked Questions

For any further inquiries or clarification, please contact Charlene Johnston at (873) 469-3859 or [charlene.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:charlene.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)


Please review the attached document for detailed information. Thank you. {Optional}
